text: Captain Blood is a 1935 American romantic adventure movie directed by Michael Curtiz and was based on the 1922 novel of the same name by Rafael Sabatini. It stars Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland, Basil Rathbone, Ross Alexander, Hobart Cavanaugh and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 5 Academy Awards in 1936. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1935 romance movies Category:1930s adventure movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:American romance movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in Jamaica
title: Captain Blood (movie)
